mapper.select: SELECT id AS id , title AS title , title_kana AS titleKana , author AS author , publishdate AS publishdate , isbn AS isbn , cover_path AS coverPath , index AS index FROM book ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id AS id , title AS title , title_kana AS titleKana , author AS author , publishdate AS publishDate , isbn AS isbn , cover_path AS coverPath , index AS index FROM book WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id AS id , title AS title , title_kana AS titleKana , author AS author , publishdate AS publishDate , isbn AS isbn , cover_path AS coverPath , index AS index FROM book WHERE 1 = 1
AND title LIKE '%${title}%'
AND author LIKE '%${author}%'
AND isbn = #{isbn}
AND title_kana LIKE '%${titleOp}%'
AND author LIKE '%${authorOp}%'
ORDER BY index ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book(title, title_kana, author, publishdate, isbn, cover_path, index) VALUES(#{title}, #{titleKana}, #{author}, #{publishDate}, #{isbn}, #{coverPath}, #{index});
